title: What are good girl's hostel in Dehradun? - Quora
tags: University of Petroleum and Energy Studies (UPES Dehradun)

response.answer_text: Hey, Check out this place called Stanza Living. They provide the best accommodation and life here is just great. Recently they organised a Paintball event for all the Stanzens.  They provide all the modern amenities like Healthy and delicious mealsLaundry servicesProfessional HousekeepingGymFast and Unlimited WifiRegular Stanza Events and a lot more

Hey, If your concern is distance from college and food, then Woodstock and Aura are good choice.I reside in Woodstock Girls Hostel. They provide transport facilities, good food, 2 sharing rooms with attached washroom, washing machine, RO and many other facilities. Take some time and visit websites of different hostels before confirmation.
